title: Deadline
description: One final job to complete.One final life to take.One final deadline.Jack Noble faces off with Frank Skinner one final time. Skinner is judge, jury, and executioner, and he's prepared to carry out a death sentence. There's only one way out. Jack has to break all the rules.Other Books in the Jack Noble Series of Political and Action ThrillersNoble Beginnings is the first of twelve Jack Noble thriller books. In addition, a recently released prequel, and two series spin-offs are available. The series has earned thousands of five-star reviews, and has been downloaded over two-million times to Kindles around the world.If you enjoy gripping thrillers loaded with suspense, action, twists & turns, Jack Noble is for you!
author: L.T. Ryan
